attributes.action: stop the BBC from closing BBC Switch and youth programming on T.V and Radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We undersign the petition to stop the BBC from closing the BBC Switch brand and where possible generate funds from other sources

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
